flow-definition.description:
Run WorldGuard Nighyly Regressions on 0.9 Branch

Owner: Pavan Madasu

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: GIT_COMMIT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Branch name or a hash pushed to github to run against

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: CONFIG_SET
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
These can either be configs, i.e. coreip_e21 coreip_p550 etc listed in a space separated list
OR
config-sets defined in
EX:
  • ALL
  • coreip_mallard
  • coreip_vector
  • coreip_caboose
  • coreip_bullet
  • coreip_rocket
All Are Defined here in the various test-plans

hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.name: SUITE
hudson.model.ChoiceParameterDefinition.description:
test-sanity* - Only Run Sanity tests on nightly configs
test-nightly-coverage - Ability to run coverage on nightly configs

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SLURM_ACCOUNT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Setting the Slurm account to bill the jobs. To see accounts that can be used please use `sshare`, but remember to only use accounts that you authorized to use.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Select the number of threads for run-suite, which is basically the number of configs to run at a time.
Based on RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS and SITEST_JOBS rules below a Jenkins Agent Will be Selected-
  • Default Small Agent (nightly_small_agent_rhel8)
  • RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS > 6 Standard Agent (nightly_standard_agent_rhel8)
  • SITEST_JOBS > 100 Standard Agent (nightly_standard_agent_rhel8)
  • SITEST_JOBS*RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS > 200 Standard Agent (nightly_standard_agent_rhel8)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITEST_JOBS
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
The number of jobs from each sitest instance to run, basically number of simulation jobs to run for a given config
Based on RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS and SITEST_JOBS rules below a Jenkins Agent Will be Selected-
  • Default Small Agent (nightly_small_agent_rhel8)
  • RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS > 6 Standard Agent (nightly_standard_agent_rhel8)
  • SITEST_JOBS > 100 Standard Agent (nightly_standard_agent_rhel8)
  • SITEST_JOBS*RUNSUITE_NUM_THREADS > 200 Standard Agent (nightly_standard_agent_rhel8)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: NODE_AGENT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
Override the Jenkins Agent to Target different Slurm Partitions/Agent Sizes
  • nightly_small_agent_rhel8 (Redhat)
  • nightly_small_cloud_agent_rhel8 (Redhat Cloud)
  • nightly_standard_agent_rhel8 (Redhat)
  • nightly_standard_cloud_agent_rhel8 (Redhat Cloud)
USE ONLY FOR OLD RELEASE BRANCHES
  • nightly_small_agent (Ubuntu)
  • nightly_small_cloud_agent (Ubuntu Cloud)
  • nightly_standard_agent (Ubuntu)

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SITEST_TEST_WALLTIME_LIMIT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description:
This can be used to set a global timeout for all tests being run
Format is HR:MIN:SEC, 02:00:00 would set the test timeout for all tests to 2hrs.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: JENKINS_TIMEOUT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Ability to decrease or increase the jenkins timeout depending on your needs, It is in hours, Default is 36hrs

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SIMSCOPE_PROJECT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Setting the SimScope Project for Regression

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SIMSCOPE_COMPONENT
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Setting the SimScope Component for Regression

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: SITEST_DELETE_ON_PASS
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: If selected then passing simulation directory will be removed once simulation finishes.

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: SLACK_CHANNEL
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: Select a slack channel to get notifications if/when your run fails.

hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.name: DISABLE_SLURM
hudson.model.BooleanParameterDefinition.description: This can be used if launching jobs on dedicated hosts such as Lambda machines
